title: december 25: to film a mockingbird
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the film adaptation of To Kill a Mockingbird, which was released today in 1962. Then, Maia brings us back to Green Day’s first big show. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
